casebody.data:
April Dawn GILBERT a/k/a April Dawn Wright, and Denise Marie Dixon and Angela Bogue
v.
HPS REAL ESTATE, INC., formerly Ralph Huff Realty, Inc., Ralph Huff, individually and d/b/a Coldwell Banker, Phil Guy, individually, and Matthew J. Watts a/k/a Rick Watts, individually. No. 503P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. Carmen J. Battle, Fayetteville, for April Dawn Gilbert, et al. James H. Locus, Jr., Fayetteville, for Matthew Watts. Ann S. Estridge, M. Robin Davis, Raleigh, for HPS Real Estate, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 23rd day of September 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2005."
